body.p: The integration layer is tested with a number of different test cases. Some of these test cases are based on EMF classes generated from XML Schemas and ecore files. A subset of the used XML Schemas is provided below so they can be used to test the integration layer. For more details please get the test project from subversion (see here).

ul.li: PrimerPO.xsd: the primer example used by XML Schema and others
ExtendedPO2.ecore (note ecore file): the extended po example from the EMF book
sun_books.xsd: example as provided by Sun for Jaxb (see here)
play.xsd: example on how to model theatre plays, (copied from here), the test case uses the following data file: play.xml
